title: Capitol Police probes swastika spotted in Rep. Dave Taylor's office
shortDescription: The U.S. Capitol Police opened an investigation after a swastika was spotted inside Republican Rep Dave Taylor's office on Oct. 14.

title: US is in a trade war with China, Trump says
shortDescription: China’s decision to restrict export of rare earth minerals on Oct. 10 triggered a round two of tit-for-tat actions.

title: Trump eyes San Francisco crackdown
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said San Francisco may be next in his federal anti-crime crackdown despite local opposition.

title: Trump says he may attend Supreme Court arguments
shortDescription: President Trump said he might attend the Supreme Court argument on tariffs because he argued the case is so important to the country's financial security.

title: Trump says San Francisco could be next target for anti-crime push
shortDescription: Trump has deployed the National Guard in Los Angeles; Washington; Chicago; Portland, Oregon, and Memphis, Tennessee, for crime fighting missions.

title: Trump might attend Supreme Court tariff arguments
shortDescription: Trump said he might attend the Supreme Court argument on tariffs because he argued the case is so important to the country's financial security.

title: Trump 'looking at' strikes on land against Venezuelan cartels
shortDescription: Trump said he is considering military strikes on land targets in his campaign to halt the flow of drugs from Venezuela after five recent boat attacks.

title: Judge temporarily reverses Trump's special ed layoffs
shortDescription: The firings were part of a broad swath of shutdown-related terminations issued by the White House on Friday, Oct. 10.

title: 'Hatchet is falling': Judge temporarily blocks Trump shutdown layoffs
shortDescription: A federal judge temporarily halted thousands of layoffs the Trump administration ordered in response to the government shutdown.

title: Why is Trump bailing out Argentina? Country facing midterm elections
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has approved $20 billion in bailout for Argentina, a country on the brink of economic crisis. Trump likes Milei's policies.

title: Obama claims 'Democracy is on the ballot' in California Prop 50 TV ad
shortDescription: Former President Barack Obama appears in a TV commercial supporting Gov. Gavin Newsom's proposed Prop 50 redistricting plan for California.

title: Trump won't 'waste our time' with Argentina if Milei loses in midterms
shortDescription: U.S. support for Argentina hinges on the ruling party of President Javier Milei succeeding in this month's midterm legislative elections, President Donald Trump said on Tuesday, saying "we're not going to waste our time" if Milei's party doesn't win. Alex Cohen has more.

title: Young Republicans racist group chat leaked
shortDescription: Politico uncovered racist, antisemitic and homophobic messages in a leaked Young Republicans Telegram chat group.

title: Young Republicans call for resignations over racist texts in chat
shortDescription: Young Republicans called for the immediate resignations of leaders exposed in a recent Politico story to have sent racist and vile text messages.

title: Changes to daylight saving time have been hard. What does Trump think?
shortDescription: Donald Trump has previously supported making daylight saving time permanent, but also called it a “50-50 issue.” When does “daylight savings” end?

title: Trump says boat strike kills six off Venezuela
shortDescription: Presdient Trump says U.S. military strike killed 6 'narcoterrorists' off Venezuela's coast in boat strike.
